official_title: Recognizing the 75th anniversary of the establishment of the American Financial Services Association.

summary.text: Declares that the Congress recognizes the 75th anniversary of the establishment of the American Financial Services Association and requests the President to issue a proclamation recognizing the same.

titles.title: Recognizing the 75th anniversary of the establishment of the American Financial Services Association.
